name: obsidian-rclone-bridge
description: Obsidian 插件：通过本地 rclone 命令实现双向同步的 GUI 包装器。

scripts.dev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'E:\Geek\Note\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-rclone-bridge' | Out-Null; Copy-Item manifest.json 'E:\Geek\Note\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-rclone-bridge\manifest.json' -Force; esbuild main.ts --bundle --format=cjs --platform=node --target=es2020 --external:obsidian --sourcemap --outfile='E:\Geek\Note\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-rclone-bridge\main.js' --watch"
